MAIN_MESSAGE: Today's planned interruption to the electrical supply in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole from 9.00am until 3.00pm has been cancelled due to unforeseen circumstances. If this work is re-arranged, we will contact you to confirm the date and time. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.02am on 28th January 2021.
